content.rendered:
A golden chariot on rails

A calendar that takes you on-board the luxury train – The Golden Chariot

The only luxury train in South India, Golden Chariot offers a mix of heritage, culture and luxury. The brief was to promote this palace on rails. A desktop calendar that showcased the opulence of this remarkable train journey.
